unit.name: Damsel
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Beloved, Insignificant, Magic Resistance (1), The Blessing, Lance Formation

unit.name: Duke
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm

unit.name: Paladin
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, The Blessing, Heavy Armour, Lance Formation, Oath of Fealty

unit.name: Castellan
unit.description: single mode,l 0-5 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Insignificant, Lowborn, Serf, Light Armour

unit.name: Knights Aspirant
unit.description: 5-15 models, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Impetuous, Scoring, The Blessing, Heavy Armour, Shield, Knight Aspirant: Devastating Charge (+1 Att), Lance Formation, Lance, Warhorse: Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 AP), Harnessed

unit.name: Knights of the Realm
unit.description: 6-15 models, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Scoring, The Blessing, Heavy Armour, Shield, Knight of the Realm: Lance Formation, Oath of Fealty, Lance, Warhorse: Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 AP), Harnessed

unit.name: Peasant Levy
unit.description: 30-60 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Insignificant, Scoring, Serf, Light Armour, Shield

unit.name: Peasant Bowmen
unit.description: 15-30 models, 0-4 Units/Army, 0-100 Models/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm

unit.name: Knights of the Quest
unit.description: 6-15 models, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Scoring, The Blessing, Heavy Armour, Shield, Knight of the Quest: Lance Formation, Questing Oath, Bastard Sword, Warhorse: Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 AP), Harnessed

unit.name: Knights Forlorn
unit.description: 10-40 models, 0-5 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Scoring, Strider (Forest), Forlorn Hope, The Blessing, Heavy Armour, Shield, Questing Oath, Bastard Sword

unit.name: Knights of the Grail
unit.description: 3-9 models, 0-2 Units/Army (0-1 Units/Army if the army includes at least one Scorpion or Trebuchet.), Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Pure of Heart, Scoring, The Blessing, Heavy Armour, Shield, Knight of the Grail: Divine Attacks, Grail Oath, Holy Might, Lance Formation, Oath of Fealty, Lance, Warhorse: Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 AP), Harnessed

unit.name: The Green Knight
unit.description: single model, 0-1 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Eternal Champion, Fear, Fearless, Ghost Step, Supernal, Terror, Thrice Blessed, Heavy Armour, Shield, The Green Knight: Lambent Sword, Spectral Stallion: Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 AP), Harnessed

unit.name: Yeoman Outriders
unit.description: 5-15 models, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Feigned Flight, Insignificant, Light Troops, Serf, Vanguard, Yeoman Outrider: Light Lance, Horse: Harnessed

unit.name: Brigands
unit.description: 10-15 models, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Insignificant, Light Troops, Scout, Serf, Skirmisher, Hard Target (1), Quick to Fire, Longbow (3+)

unit.name: Peasant Crusaders
unit.description: 20-40 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Bodyguard (Sacred Reliquary), Impetuous, Insignificant, Scoring, Serf, Light Armour, Devastating Charge (+1 Att), Hatred

unit.name: Sacred Reliquary
unit.description: single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 40x60 mm, Holy Fervor, Impetuous, Insignificant, Not a Leader, War Platform, The Blessing, Heavy Armour, Devastating Charge (+1 Att), Impact Hits (D3), Oath of Fealty

unit.name: Scorpion
unit.description: single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Construct, Base 75 mm round, Insignificant, Serf, War Machine, Move or Fire, Scorpion (4+)

unit.name: Trebuchet
unit.description: single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 75 mm round, Insignificant, Serf, War Machine, Move or Fire, Trebuchet (4+)

unit.name: Pegasus Knights
unit.description: 3-6 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 40x40 mm, Fly (8", 16"), Light Troops, The Blessing, Heavy Armour, Shield, Pegasus Knight: Devastating Charge (+1 Att), Oath of Fealty, Lance, Young Pegasus: Harnessed

mount.name: Horse
mount.description: Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Feigned Flight, Light Troops, Harnessed

mount.name: Barded Warhorse
mount.description: Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 AP), Harnessed

mount.name: Equitan Unicorn
mount.description: Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Forest Guide, Magic Resistance (2), Harnessed

mount.name: Pegasus
mount.description: Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 40x40 mm, Fly (8", 16"), Light Troops, Harnessed

mount.name: Hippogriff
mount.description: 0-2 Mounts/Army, Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 50x50 mm, Fear, Fly (8", 16"), Light Troops, Towering Presence, Devastating Charge (+1 Att), Harnessed

item.name: Impetuous
item.description: A unit consisting entirely of models with this rule may reroll failed Charge Range rolls. The model gains Frenzy and Fearless while Engaged in Combat.

item.name: Serf
item.description: A unit gains +2" March Rate until the end of the Movement Phase if both the following conditions are met: - More than half of its models with Type Infantry and/or Cavalry have Serf. - The unit is under the effect of Commanding Presence from one or more models with Oath of Fealty at the start of its March Move.

item.name: The Blessing
item.description: The model gains Aegis (6+). Before rolling for the first turn (at the beginning of step 7 of the Deployment Phase Sequence), decide if the Kingdom of Equitaine army Prays or not. If it does, friendly models with The Blessing gain an additional Aegis (5+, against Strength 5 or more), and the army cannot gain any bonus to the Roll for First Turn.

item.name: Lance Formation
item.description: Close Combat. The model gains Fight in Extra Rank. If more than half of a units models have Lance Formation, it only needs to be 3 models wide in order to form Full Ranks. In addition, the model gains Devastating Charge (Fight in Extra Rank) if its unit is exactly 3 models wide.

item.name: Bastard Sword
item.description: Close Combat Weapon. Attacks made with this weapon gain +2 Strength, +2 Armour Penetration, and always strike at Initiative Step 0 (regardless of the wielders Agility). In the First Round of Combat, it may instead be used as a Spear if the wielder is Infantry or as a Light Lance if the wielder is not Infantry. All R&F models in the unit must use the weapon in the same way. A Bastard Sword can be enchanted as if it was a Great Weapon.

item.name: Grail Oath
Grail Oath (Character)
item.description: 0-1 Characters with Grail Oath per Army. - Universal Rule. The model gains Fearless. - Personal Protection. The model gains Aegis (5+). Characters with Grail Oath gain +1 Defensive Skill. - Attack Attribute - Close Combat. The model part gains Magical Attacks. Characters with Grail Oath gain +1 Offensive Skill.

item.name: Oath of Fealty
item.description: - Universal Rule. The model gains Commanding Presence with the following restrictions: It has a range of 6" and can only benefit units with more than half of their models with Serf.

item.name: Questing Oath
item.description: - Universal Rule. The model is immune to the effects of Fear from enemy models. Models with Questing Oath gain +2" Advance Rate when rolling for Charge Range against enemy units with at least one model with Fear. - Attack Attribute - Close Combat. The model part gains +1 to hit with Close Combat Attacks against models with Fear.

item.name: Might
item.description: One of a Kind. When using a Lance, the bearer gains Devastating Charge (+1 Att, +1 Str, +1 AP). When Charging and using a Lance, every unsaved wound caused by the bearers Close Combat Attacks, before applying Multiple Wounds, generates another Close Combat Attack: - Allocate and resolve the new attacks before removing any casualties, in the same Initiative Step as the attacks that generated them. - You cannot generate more attacks than there were Health Points in the Health Pool towards which the initial attacks were allocated. - The new attacks do not generate any further attacks.

item.name: Renown
item.description: One of a Kind. The bearer gains Lethal Strike. Close Combat Attacks made by the bearer that roll a natural 6 to wound gain Multiple Wounds (D3).

item.name: Piety
item.description: One of a Kind. The bearer and all R&F models in the bearers unit gain Aegis (+1, max. 5+). The bearer may only join Standard Height units.

item.name: Valour
item.description: One of a Kind. The bearer automatically issues a Duel whenever possible (this cannot be prevented by issuing a Duel with another friendly model first), and this Duel must be accepted whenever possible. When Fighting a Duel, the bearer must reroll failed to-hit and to-wound rolls.

item.name: Daring
item.description: One of a Kind. Charge Range rolls of the bearers unit and Charge Range rolls against enemy units in base contact with the bearer are subject to Maximised Roll.

item.name: Audacity
item.description: One of a Kind. Attacks made by the bearer that are allocated towards models of Large Height must reroll failed tohit rolls. Attacks made by the bearer that are allocated towards models with Towering Presence must reroll failed to-hit and failed to-wound rolls.

item.name: Humility
item.description: 0-2 per Army. The bearers Commanding Presence range is set to 12", and it gains Insignificant and Rally Around the Flag. However, only units with more than half of their models with Insignificant may benefit from this instance of Rally Around the Flag.

item.name: Divine Judgement
item.description: Cannot be taken by a model with Might. Enchantment: Lance. Attacks made with this weapon gain Devastating Charge (Multiple Wounds (D3+1)) and become Magical Attacks.

item.name: Tristans Resolve
item.description: Enchantment: Hand Weapon. When using this weapon, the wielder gains +1 Strength, +1 Armour Penetration, +1 Attack Value, and Magical Attacks. After a successful to-hit roll, the attacker may discard one of the hits with this weapon and choose an enchanted weapon carried by the model the attack was allocated towards. The Weapon Enchantments of the chosen weapon are ignored for the rest of the battle.

item.name: Wyrmwood Core
item.description: Enchantment: Lance. The wielder gains Breath Attack (Str 5, AP 0, Flaming Attacks). Attacks made with this weapon become Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks.

item.name: Crusaders Salvation
item.description: Dominant. Enchantment: Heavy Armour. The wearer gains +1 Armour and must reroll failed Armour Saves.

item.name: Faith of Percival
item.description: Dominant. Cannot be taken by models with Towering Presence. Enchantment: Shield. While using this Shield, the wearer gains Aegis (+1, max. 4+). Attacks against the bearer that are Divine Attacks lose this Attack Attribute while using this Shield.

item.name: Fortress of Faith
item.description: Enchantment: Shield. While using this Shield, the bearer must reroll natural to-hit and to-wound rolls of 1 with its Close Combat Attacks, and must reroll natural Armour Save rolls of 1.

item.name: Uthers Conviction
item.description: Enchantment: Heavy Armour. The bearer gains +1 Armour and Aegis (+1, max. 4+, against Armour Penetration 6 or more).

item.name: Banner of the Last Charge
item.description: R&F Cavalry models in the bearers unit gain Impact Hits (X), where X is equal to the number of Full Ranks in the unit. These Impact Hits are resolved with Strength 4 and Armour Penetration 1.

item.name: Oriflamme
item.description: Cannot be taken by units that count towards Core. The bearer gains Fear. Enemy units in base contact with the bearers unit cannot benefit from Rally Around the Flag.

item.name: Banner of Roland
item.description: The bearers unit gains Aegis (+1, max. 4+, against Ranged Attacks). In addition, enemy units cannot choose Stand and Shoot as a Charge Reaction when reacting to Charges made by the bearers unit.

item.name: Banner of the Green Knight
item.description: 0-2 per Army. One use only. May be activated during the owners Movement Phase. The bearers unit gains +2" March Rate, Ghost Step, and loses Scoring. All friendly units are treated as Impassable Terrain. The effects last until the start of the next Player Turn.

item.name: Storm Clarion
item.description: One use only. May be activated at the start of any Player Turn. Enemy units cannot make Flying Movements during this Player Turn.

item.name: Black Knights Tabard
item.description: Dominant. One use only. Activate when the bearer reaches 0 (or fewer) Health Points. Ignore all Health Point losses below 0 and do not remove the bearer as a casualty. Instead, after resolving all simultaneous attacks (such as all Shooting Attacks from the same unit or all Melee Attacks at the same Initiative Step), the bearers Health Points are set to 1, and it gains Aegis (3+) until the end of the Player Turn.

item.name: Crystal of the Valiant Charge
item.description: Dominant. Wizards only. One use only. May be activated at the start of the opponents Magic Phase. In this phase, during Siphon the Veil, before converting Veil Tokens into Magic Dice, remove 1 Veil Token from the Active Players Veil Token pool for each friendly unit that is Engaged in Combat within 18" of the bearer. Add the Veil Tokens removed this way to your Veil Token pool. This cannot increase your Veil Token pool beyond 6 Veil Tokens. Any excess Veil Tokens are discarded.

item.name: Wafers of Penitence
item.description: Wizards only. One use only. May be activated after rolling for a Dispelling Attempt. Add +2 to the rolled result. This is an exception to the Casting and Dispelling Modifiers rule.

item.name: Forest Guide
item.description: Universal Rule. The models unit gains Magical Attacks and Strider (Forest).

item.name: Beloved
item.description: Universal Rule. When the model is joined to a unit with at least one Full Rank of models with Lance Formation, it gains Stand Behind and cannot be chosen by the opponent as the model that suffers the penalties for refusing a Duel.

item.name: Questing Oath and Bastard Sword
item.description: - Questing Oath: Universal Rule. The model is immune to the effects of Fear from enemy models. Models with Questing Oath gain +2" Advance Rate when rolling for Charge Range against enemy units with at least one model with Fear. - Attack Attribute - Close Combat. The model part gains +1 to hit with Close Combat Attacks against models with Fear. - Bastard Sword: Close Combat Weapon. Attacks made with this weapon gain +2 Strength, +2 Armour Penetration, and always strike at Initiative Step 0 (regardless of the wielders Agility). In the First Round of Combat, it may instead be used as a Spear if the wielder is Infantry or as a Light Lance if the wielder is not Infantry. All R&F models in the unit must use the weapon in the same way. A Bastard Sword can be enchanted as if it was a Great Weapon.

item.name: Bannerman
Bannerman (Standard Bearer)
item.description: Universal Rule. 0-2 Models/Army. The Castellan gains Stand Behind and is a Standard Bearer.

item.name: Master-at-Arms
item.description: Universal Rule. The Castellan gains +1 Attack Value and its unit gains Weapon Master.

item.name: Lowborn
item.description: Universal Rule. The model may only join units comprised entirely of models with Insignificant.

item.name: Bowmens Stakes
item.description: Universal Rule. When deploying the unit, you may place a Wall Terrain Feature fully within 1" of the units Front Facing but not in contact with any other Terrain Feature except Open Terrain. This Wall is up to 20 mm deep, and its length cannot be wider than the unit, to a maximum of 12". It follows the normal rules for Walls, with the exception that it contributes to Soft Cover instead of Hard Cover.

item.name: Braziers
item.description: Attack Attribute - Shooting. Before shooting a Longbow, the model may choose to gain Flaming Attacks for its Shooting Attack. The effect lasts for the duration of the phase.

item.name: Longbow and Braziers
Longbow (4+) and Braziers
item.description: - Longbow: Range 30", Shots 1, Strength 3, AP 0, Volley Fire - Braziers: Attack Attribute - Shooting. Before shooting a Longbow, the model may choose to gain Flaming Attacks for its Shooting Attack. The effect lasts for the duration of the phase.

item.name: Forlorn Hope
item.description: Personal Protection. Enemy models do not count as Charging for the purpose of Devastating Charge when attacking models with Forlorn Hope.

item.name: Holy Might
item.description: Attack Attribute - Close Combat. The model part can make up to 2 Supporting Attacks while its unit has at least one Full Rank.

item.name: Pure of Heart
item.description: Universal Rule. Only Damsels and Characters with Grail Oath may join the unit.

item.name: Eternal Champion
item.description: Universal Rule. The Green Knight cannot be deployed during the Deployment Phase. Once per game, at the start of any of your Movement Phases, you may deploy The Green Knight within 6" of a friendly Damsel. The Green Knight cannot perform a March Move this Player Turn. If The Green Knight has not been deployed by the end of the game, it counts as destroyed. While The Green Knight is within 12" of a friendly Damsel, it gains Stubborn and may issue and accept Duels as if it was a Champion.

item.name: Lambent Sword
item.description: Close Combat Weapon. Attacks made with this weapon gain +2 Strength, +2 Armour Penetration, and ignore Parry.

item.name: Thrice Blessed
item.description: Personal Protection. The Green Knight gains The Blessing. If the army Prayed, The Green Knight gains Aegis (+1).

item.name: Holy Fervor
item.description: Universal Rule. A unit joined by a Sacred Reliquary gains Fight in Extra Rank. If the Sacred Reliquary is in base contact with an enemy model, the Sacred Reliquary and all friendly units that are Engaged in the same Combat gain +1 Armour.

item.name: Scorpion
item.description: Artillery Weapon. Range 48", Shots 1, Str 3 [6], AP 10, Area Attack (1x5), [Multiple Wounds (D3+1, Clipped Wings)].

item.name: Trebuchet
item.description: Artillery Weapon. Catapult (4x4). Range 12-60", Shots 1, Str 4 [8], AP 2 [6], [Multiple Wounds (D3, Clipped Wings)].

item.name: Loose Formation
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Hard Target (1) and Skirmisher.
